# isarray

Array#isArray for older browsers.

## Usage

```js var isArray = require(‘isarray’);

console.log(isArray([])); // => true console.log(isArray({})); // => false ```

## Installation

With [npm](http://npmjs.org) do

`bash $ npm install isarray `

Then bundle for the browser with [browserify](https://github.com/substack/browserify).

With [component](http://component.io) do

`bash $ component install juliangruber/isarray `
